thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com | 4 of 85
thread.title: Marc Wallior
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Marc Wallior

author: Marc Wallior
title: Marc Wallior
text:
Could not be more satisfied! The website is extraordinarily good, lots of information and great product selection. I placers my order and within two days I got everything, with shipping and tracking updates automatically. When I receiveed the products they were carefully wrapped and well protected so they wouldn't be damaged in shipment. everything works great, I am more than satisfied with this company. Very impressed.
Marc, from Granite Bay California.
